name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Highlighter & Sticky Notes | Sitespedia - Annotate Websites and PDFs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight and manage important words on websites and add them to sticky notes. You can also change the highlight colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlighter is a versatile browser extension designed to make web content annotation easy and efficient. With the ability to highlight text in various colors, add notes, and organize your highlights, Highlighter transforms your web browsing into a powerful research and reading tool.

1. Flexible Text Highlighting

Multiple Highlight Colors: Choose from a variety of colors to highlight text, allowing you to categorize and differentiate information easily.

Customizable Highlight Styles: Adjust the opacity and style of highlights to match your preferences and needs.

Highlight Entire Webpages: Highlight text on entire webpages or within specific sections for comprehensive annotation.

2. User-Friendly Interface

Intuitive Design: A simple, easy-to-use interface that allows you to highlight and manage text effortlessly.

Customizable Toolbar: Adjust the position and appearance of the toolbar to suit your browsing habits and preferences.

Whether youâ€™re conducting research, managing projects, or simply capturing important information, Highlighter provides the tools you need to stay organized and productive.
